name: Joshua Dracul
text: This Pizza Hut location is amazing!!! I ordered a personal pan on the app and when i picked it up at the window they said they ran out of personal pans and made me a bigger pizza!!! This whole pizza for $4.50!!! Thank you guys!

name: Clifton T. Henson
text: Their cheese is better than anyone else's.

name: Jo Jones
text: Pizza was fast hot and ready on time.

name: Mary Bloxson
text: Management n workers are rude n food is not of good quality

name: DAVID POPE
text: Young girl that took my call in also waited on me . Very friendly always had a smile. Very pleased.

name: Kimerland Woolie
text: My orders are fast and fresh, any issue that may have occurred was quickly resolved by the staff.

name: Janet Odle
text: Delivery guy  was extremely nice  , Pizza & Naked wings were Hot & Delicious.

name: EdensWeigh
text: This Pizza Hut has good food but they do need more than 1 steady delivery driver (majority of the time you have to go get your food here). This Pizza Hut is in a decent location too. I actually remember when it was being built by the hotel. ‚Ä¶More

name: Robert Young
text: The service was great. The two young ladies that helped me were awesome. The pizza and lemon pepper chicken was delicious.

name: Brenda
text: Best Pizza Hut I've been to in a long time.Friendly servers, food was served fast, and hot...The dining area needed to be vacuumed.I will be visiting again.

name: Ashley Mallett
text: Pizza Hut is getting so bad. The service was very, very slow for everyone in there. This is the second time I had to back up from the drive through and go inside the building to get my order. The customer service was great on both ‚Ä¶More

name: Jennifer Mc
text: Was there for the buffet . No pasta when we arrived or left. Too expensive for what you get...

name: Dina owen
text: Very nice staff, wonderful food.

name: Mark Smith
text: Good service, and this one still has a salad bar.

name: fullerbenita
text: Food was good and hot when delivered.

name: Ella Sue Nowell
text: If there was a no star I would have selected this. I keep returning in hopes that service and food has improved. Carried the grandchildren for lunch and had to actually bus and clean a table so we could sit. Buffet wasn't clean and inadequate plates etc. Same type of pizza no variety.

name: Elizabeth Allen
text: Service was terrible... we didn't even get something  to drink.

name: Joann Burnside
text: I'm very disappointed with my order. I ordered the Big Box Dinner and the breadsticks where thinner than the pizza crust and my pizza was almost burnt!!! A waist of money!!!

name: Faith Travis
text: Went in to review my application and the woman said they weren't hiring then 30 minutes later they posted that they needed help again not to mention it took 3 hours to deliver my food right next door. Not only that but when I went in to eat there were tables open but the hostess said they were booked till next week

name: Jeannie Herod
text: They need more help. Especially to answer phone and take orders. Waited 20 minutes in drive through to pick up order. Finally just parked and went in, still had to wait 20 minutes for order that had been ordered an hour ago on line. Pay some people. Please!

name: michael Guyton
text: The Pizza and Srrvice was good, but my bread sticks was not cut. I did a carry out didn't chk b4 I left

name: Guice Atkinson
text: The pizza was good the salad bar was very basic I also left my phone and and the second call they found it so yeah a 3

name: Wendy Jordan
text: We was passing through from Memphis, I did an online carry out order, but went in to pick it up. The lady that checked us out was super nice, and made sure we got everything we needed :)

name: Zack Hardin
text: Good pizza best in town

name: Mary Lucus

name: Rebekah Tanner
text: We ordered carryout and it was dry and cooked too long. You could barely chew it because it was so hard. You couldn't tast any sauce either. When I got there to pick it up my 5 year old son slipped and fell in vomit going into the men's restroom. Not pleased with Pizza hut at all tonight.

text: Self serve, the buffet (pizza) is ok, nothing to write home about. The salad bar is lacking,  there is alot to be desired.  They could be better and should be better. I can understand why so many are going to Little Ceaser's.
